title: Beaconcrest's Divney Is Avoiding Retail, But Likes Coach(Audio)
itunes:title: Beaconcrest's Divney Is Avoiding Retail, But Likes Coach(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Kevin Divney, Chief Investment Officer and Founder of Beaconcrest Capital, for a look at the market reaction to the Fed minutes, and what sectors he is deploying capital to.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
